taskDescription: 1,3-Cyclopentadiene is very reactive in Diels–Alder cycloaddition reactions, but 1,3-cyclohexadiene is less reactive and 1,3-cycloheptadiene is nearly inert. Explain. (Molecular models are helpful.)
